Question
========

In the population of psychology students, the variable height has a normal distribution with mean 177.6 cm and standard deviation of 5.0 cm. In a *random sample* of 25 students, what is the probability of finding a mean height that is greater than 176.6?

Answerlist
----------

* 0.841.
* 0.977.
* 1.000.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 0.841.: Correct
* 0.977.: Incorrect
* 1.000.: Incorrect
